Exercises.name: Push Up
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 5 sets of 10 each time. 1 minute break in between sets.

Exercises.name: Pull-ups
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 4 sets of 5 each time. 2 minute break in between sets.

Exercises.name: Squats
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 4 sets of 10 each time. 3 minute break in between sets

Exercises.name: Sit ups
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 4 sets of 20 each. 1 minute break in between sets

Exercises.name: Planks
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 3 sets of 60 seconds each.

Exercises.name: Lunges
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 4 sets of 12 each. 1 minute break in between sets.

Exercises.name: Dips
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 4 sets of 5 each. 2 minute break in between sets.

Exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
Exercises.desc: Recommended times: 100 jumping jacks per days, or more.
